text: Eye of the Hurricane (1989, Persian: در مسیر تندباد, Dar masir tondbad) is a film by the Iranian director Masoud Jafari Jozani. Set during the Second World War, it starred Ezzatolah Entezami, Majid Mozaffari, and Ahmad Hashemi. It won the Crystal Simorgh for best film. ==References== Category:Iranian films Category:1989 films Category:Crystal Simorgh for Best Film winners
title: Eye of the Hurricane (1989 film)
